contributions: Developed a full-stack ERP system with Flask backend and dynamic JS frontend
Built an AI-driven Intelligent Traffic Management System (ITMS) using YOLO and OpenCV for real-time violation detection and analytics dashboard
Built scalable AI systems for pharmaceutical data extraction and analysis using LangChain, FAISS, and Azure OCR
Developed multi-agent pipelines leveraging Groq and Qwen models for real-time data querying and summarization
Performed EDA and preprocessing on large datasets
Implemented ML models (Random Forest, SVM, XGBoost)
Deployed best-performing model via Streamlit dashboard for real-time predictions and business insights

projects.name: NFC Payment System
projects.description: Cloud-integrated NFC payment platform with merchant/customer dashboards, real-time wallet sync, sub-1s latency transactions. Integrated Supabase for storage and an LLM-powered assistant.

projects.name: Intelligent Traffic Management System (ITMS)
projects.description: AI-powered system for traffic violation detection using computer vision and YOLO. Full-stack solution with Flask backend and real-time dashboard.

projects.name: OCR-Based Retrieval System
projects.description: OCR-powered semantic search tool for pharma documents using Azure OCR, FAISS embeddings, and LLM-based summarization.

projects.name: Agentic AI Pharma Chatbot
projects.description: Multi-agent chatbot for pharma API recommendations with RAG-based contextual reasoning and live web scraping.

achievements: Awarded merit scholarship for outstanding academic performance (2023-24)
